00006                 {
00007                         return base64_encode($txt);

00010                 public static function decode($txt)
00011                 {

00013                         return base64_decode($txt);
00014                 }

00016                 public static function encode_linelength($txt, $line_length = 32)
00017                 {
00018                         $b64 = self::encode($txt);
00019                         $buf = "";
00020                         while (strlen($b64) > 0)
00021                         {
00022                                 $buf .= substr($b64, 0, $line_length) . "\n";
00023                                 $b64 = substr($b64, $line_length);
00024                         }
00025                         return $buf;
00026                 }

00029                 {

00031                                 "",
